com.expertdesk.edplus
Class EntryUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.expertdesk.edplus.EntryUtil

public final class EntryUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Static utility class to convert an Entry to a Map and vice versa.

Author:
Hugo Visser

Method Summary
static com.remedy.arsys.api.Entry toEntry(java.lang.String form, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,com.remedy.arsys.api.Value> entryMap)

          Convert an entry to a map of field id, value pairs.

Method Detail

toEntryMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,com.remedy.arsys.api.Value> toEntryMap(com.remedy.arsys.api.Entry entry,
                                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,com.remedy.arsys.api.Value> entryMap)
Convert an entry to a map of field id, value pairs. So that the Value can be retrieve by field id like so: 
  Entry entry = ...
  Map<Long,Value> entryMap = EntryUtil.toEntryMap(entry, new HashMap<Long, Value>());
  
  // get the value of the request id 
  
  Value v = entryMap.get(1L);

Parameters:
entry - the entry to convert
entryMap - the map to add the result to
Returns:
the entryMap that is updated with the fieldId,Value pairs

toEntryMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,com.remedy.arsys.api.Value> toEntryMap(com.remedy.arsys.api.Entry entry)
Convert an entry to a map of field id, value pairs.

Parameters:
entry - the entry to convert
Returns:
a new entryMap representing the entry.
See Also:
toEntryMap(Entry, Map)

toEntry

public static com.remedy.arsys.api.Entry toEntry(java.lang.String form,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,com.remedy.arsys.api.Value> entryMap)
Convert an entryMap to a entry. If the map contains a request id (field id 1) then the value of the field will be set as the entry id.

Parameters:
form - the form to create the entry for
entryMap - the entryMap to convert
Returns:
a new entry
